p: Artemisia parviflora Buch is a non-aromatic, erect and tall perennial herb with versatile sessile, linear cuneate leaves, greenish-white flower heads in racemes (Rana et al. 2003). Leaves are linear-oblong much reduced terminally, panicles are terminating in the branchlets. Capitulum is cream-colored. Glabrous phyllaries and sterile disc florets are present.
